# Step 2: Calculate Flesch-Kincaid Grade Level
import re
def calculate_flesch_kincaid(text):
    words = len(re.findall(r'\\b\\w+\\b', text))
    sentences = len(re.findall(r'[.!?]+', text))
    syllables = sum(len(re.findall(r'[aeiouy]+', word)) for word in re.findall(r'\\b\\w+\\b', text))
    return round(0.39 * (words / sentences) + 11.8 * (syllables / words) - 15.59, 2)

# Step 3: Check the output
